channel.title: Question About MySQL
channel.description: Does MySQL have anything to do with the RSPS client and server connecting to the internet? If so how what version do i need,how do i set it up, and how do i know that its working?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2009, 07:15:39 pm[/size][hr]Delete this topic! Computer lag made me post twice!

item.title: Question About MySQL
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

MYSQL is for hosting clients on websites w/out using a webclient. you need hamachi or no-ip to set the server up to the internet then you upload your stats to runel0cus or some rsps site then they can play
p.s. if you use hamach then you need to post your network name,password, and hamachi ip.

Read full topic
